[[Image:Red Lake Pin.png|thumb|right|200px|A map showing the location of Red Lake on the continent of Westeros.]]
'''Red Lake''' is a castle in [[the Reach]], the region controlled by [[House Tyrell]] of [[Highgarden]]. The castle is located north-west of Highgarden and due west of [[Goldengrove]], near the border with [[the Westerlands]].<ref>[http://viewers-guide.hbo.com/game-of-thrones/season1/#!/locations/highgarden/ HBO viewers guide, season 1 map, Highgarden entry]</ref>
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Red Lake is the seat of House Crane. It is located along the shores of a large lake of the same name.
